### Total Alignment Score Calculation:
The total alignment score is calculated as the average of all element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} \]
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{1.0 + 0.833333 + 0.666667 + 1.0 + 1.0 + 0.5 + 0.833333 + 1.0 + 0.666667 + 0.666667 + 0.833333 + 1.0 + 0.833333 + 0.833333}{14} \]
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{11.666662}{14} \approx 0.833333 \]
